entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:14 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
